title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, May 8, 2021
description: Poet and Zen practitioner Gary Snyder, was born in San Francisco on this day in 1930. His most recent book is one of essays, “The Practice of the Wild,” published in 2020.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
